function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global recession impacting growth prospects","Impact":"Severe economic downturn, loss of 25 million jobs globally","Mitigation":"Financial support for affected industries and workers, policy measures to stimulate economic recovery","Technologies":"Economic modeling and forecasting tools, digital financial platforms for support distribution","People":"Small-and medium-sized enterprises, self-employed, informal economy workers, women in the workforce","Owner":"Government, international financial organizations, employers' organizations"},{"Description":"Disruptions in industrial manufacturing and drop in commodity prices","Impact":"Tightened liquidity conditions, capital outflows, financial market disruptions","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply chains, strategic stockpiling of essential goods, investment in technology for supply chain resilience","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, predictive analytics for commodity prices, advanced manufacturing technologies","People":"Manufacturing industries, financial institutions, global supply chain actors","Owner":"Manufacturers, financial regulators, international trade organizations"}]}
